tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Pest_and_Disease_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    pest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    occurrence_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE pests (
  id INT,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  id INT,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE fields (
  id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  area FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE occurrences (
  id INT,
  pest_id INT,
  disease_id INT,
  field_id INT,
  date_occurred DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pest_id) REFERENCES pests(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES diseases(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(id)
)
